snippet: The Detroit outfielder Delmon Young was suspended, retroactive to Friday, after being arrested on a second-degree aggravated harassment charge.
abstract: Detroit Tigers outfielder Delmon Young is suspended for seven days without pay by Major League Baseball after his arrest in Manhattan on a second-degree aggravated harassment charge.

byline.contributor: Joanne C. Gerstner contributed reporting from Detroit.

lead_paragraph: The Detroit outfielder Delmon Young was suspended, retroactive to Friday, after being arrested on a second-degree aggravated harassment charge.

headline.seo: Tigers’ Delmon Young Suspended for 7 Days
headline.main: Tigers’ Young Is Suspended for 7 Days After His Arrest
headline.print_headline: Tigers’ Young Is Suspended For 7 Days After His Arrest
